ing: 1 fresh pineapple - peeled, cored, and chopped
1 pinch chile powder with lime (such as TajinÂ®), or to taste
des: "Pineapple, cucumber, and mango are mixed with lemon juice and chile powder with lime in this quick and spicy, Mexican-inspired fruit salad."
ins: Combine pineapple, strawberries, cucumber, and mango in a bowl; add lemon juice and mix well. Sprinkle chile powder over the top and stir. Top salad with more chile powder.
